# PED::SET_PED_MIN_MOVE_BLEND_RATIO

## Summary
Set the min move blend ratio a ped can move at - needs to be called everyframe, or will revert to stand

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **FLOAT** moveBlendRatio
